conclusion: Define the system and assumptions for blocks P and Q on the inclined plane.
Apply conservation of momentum during the collision to derive equation v_0 = v_{P_1} + 4 v_{Q_1}.
Apply conservation of kinetic energy during the collision to derive equation v_0^2 = v_{P_1}^2 + 4 v_{Q_1}^2.
Solve the system of equations to express v_{P_1} in terms of v_0 and v_{Q_1}.
Substitute v_{P_1} from equation (3) into equation (2) and simplify to derive 0 = -8 v_0 v_{Q_1} + 20 v_{Q_1}^2.
